warrior-skills-description.Slash: Strongly slays an enemy and inflicts %damage physical damage.

warrior-skills-description.Dragon Spirit: Increases Max HP by 145 and recovers HP equivalent to 5% of HP recovery rate every 8 seconds during combat.
warrior-skills-description.How of Valor: Increases your party's STR, DEX and INT by 3 for 10 minutes.
warrior-skills-description.Earthquake: Deals 214 physical damage to all enemies within 5 meters and lowers their move speed by 20 for 6 seconds.
